abstract: Lawyer for former House Speaker J Dennis Hastert tells federal judge that he will seek to have charges against his client dropped; Hastert faces accusations that he lied to FBI and illegally structured bank withdrawals to cover up payments for unspecified misconduct from decades earlier; it has been reported that misconduct involved sexual acts with male student.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for J. Dennis Hastert, a former speaker of the House of Representatives, told a federal judge in Chicago on Tuesday that he would seek to have the charges against Mr. Hastert dismissed.

headline.main: Illinois: Lawyer for Hastert Will Seek to Have Charges Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Lawyer for Hastert Will Seek to Have Charges Dismissed

snippet: A lawyer for J. Dennis Hastert, a former speaker of the House of Representatives, told a federal judge in Chicago on Tuesday that he would seek to have the charges against Mr. Hastert dismissed.
